alert.note: Alert for Indian Wells Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 11 at 8:40AM PDT until October 11 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Sustained west winds 25 to 35 mph, with gusts around 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Indian Wells Valley, Mojave Desert Slopes and Mojave Desert. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. Blowing dust will reduce visibilities at times. Travel will be difficult, particularly for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not limited to Highway 14, U.S. Highway 395, Highway 58 below Tehachapi Pass, including the town of Mojave, and Highway 178 below Walker Pass, including the town of Inyokern.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Indian Wells Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes
